meta-review.comment: Trinity Fusion offers a unique and addictive gameplay loop with a fresh dimension hopping angle. The combat is engaging, though it lacks the fluidity of some peers. The game's multiverse premise and responsive controls make it a standout rogue-lite, perfect for newcomers and aficionados alike. With its staying power and stylish combat, Trinity Fusion is well on its way to becoming a stellar juggernaut in the genre.
